thread.section_title: Days Hotel London- Waterloo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Try and give this one a miss
thread.title_full: Try and give this one a miss - Review of Days Hotel London- Waterloo, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Tony G
title: Try and give this one a miss
text:
We stayed here whilst attending an event at the Park Plaza at Westminster. The rooms were extremely small with very limited space in both the bedroom and the bathroom.
The breakfast that was served was very poor and I'd avoid this hotel if you have to. Quite a disappointment
